Package com.mlt.task

Class Task

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.common.task.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestTaskExecutor.Print, TestTaskExecutorExc.Print, TestTaskExecutorMult.Print
public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
A task aimed to be executed in a task pool.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.Boolean cancelRequested
    A boolean that indicates whether the execution should be cancelled.
    private java.lang.Throwable exception
    Exception thrown when the execution failed.
    (package private) TaskExecutor.Group group
    Group of tasks set when executed by the task executor to keep track of all tasks of the same group and eventually cancel all tasks when an exception is thrown within the group.
    private State state
    The state, READY on creation.
    private java.time.LocalDateTime timeEnd
    Time when when execution ended, either successfully or not.
    private java.time.LocalDateTime timeStart
    Time when when execution started.

      A boolean indicating whether execution should be cancelled.

    • requestCancel

      public void requestCancel()
      Request the task to cancel execution.

    • setCancelled

      protected void setCancelled()
      Indicate that the task has been already cancelled. Extenders should call this method when acquainted of a request of cancel, and immediately exit the main loop.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates whether the task is ready and waiting to be executed.

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates whether the tas is running.

    • hasSucceded

      public boolean hasSucceded()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates whether the task has terminated successfully.

    • wasCancelled

      public boolean wasCancelled()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates whether tha task has been cancelled.

    • hasFailed

      public boolean hasFailed()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates whether the task has failed and thrown an exception.

    • hasTerminated

      public boolean hasTerminated()
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating that the task has terminated.
